titleStmt.title: Ordered upon the question (nemine contradicente) that this House do agree to the report of their committee, containing their several objections against the bill, intituled, An Act of Free and General Pardon, Indempnity and Oblivion ... by the knights, citizens, and burgesses assembled in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 4 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
